person.note: Liu(2) Chang [3580] His wives #1 and #2 were both daughters of a Lun Cheng (sororate), who was an investigating censor although he does not appear as such in any list nor does this surname appear in any index--the only Lun in Renming Da cidian were members of one Nanhai county family in Ming. Jiangxi TZ, 21.15b; Ouyang Xiu, WJ, 35.4a-7a; Liu Ban, WJ, 35.1a-29a. CBD, 5, 3881-2.
